sentence.Network_en: It enabled its members to settle their differences without recourse to war.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样，其成员就可以不必诉诸战争来解决分歧。

sentence.Network_en: The public believes its only recourse is to take to the streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 公众认为唯一的办法就是上街游行。

sentence.Network_en: Your only recourse is legal action.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的唯一依靠就是诉诸法律。

recourse to 求助于recourse 求助recourse 追索

jx.jx_en_mean: (Finance)a formula used to disclaim responsibility for future non-payment, especially of a negotiable financial instrument
jx.jx_cn_mean: (财政)无追索权（为未来无力支付时拒赔的程式用语，尤指可转让金融证券）

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'running or flowing back'): from Old French recours, from Latin recursus, from re- 'back, again' + cursus 'course, running'

entry.def: If you achieve something without recourse to a particular course of action, you succeed without carrying out that action. To have recourse to a particular course of action means to have to do that action in order to achieve something.

example.ex: It enabled its members to settle their differences without recourse to war...
example.tran: 这样，其成员就可以不必诉诸战争来解决分歧。

example.ex: The public believes its only recourse is to take to the streets.
example.tran: 公众认为唯一的办法就是上街游行。

means.word_mean: 1. act of turning to for assistance;

sentences.sentence: "an appeal to his uncle was his last resort"

means.word_mean: 2. something or someone turned to for assistance or security;

auth_sentence.content: Our mothers...could have recourse to a hatpin if attacked.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our mothers...could have recourse to a hatpin if attacked.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our mothers...could have recourse to a hatpin if attacked.

auth_sentence.content: Caught off guard, solo-goers can be left without recourse.
auth_sentence.res_content: Caught off guard, solo-goers can be left without recourse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Caught off guard, solo-goers can be left without recourse.

auth_sentence.content: Here the only recourse was a tax shelter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here the only recourse was a tax shelter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here the only recourse was a tax shelter.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 粗糙的,粗劣的;粗鲁的,粗俗的
stems_affixes.word_buile: coar=cours跑,发生,快速做……+e快速做过去→粗糙的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 集合, 合流, 群众, 场所, 中央广场
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+course[n.课程,教程;过程,进程;路程,路线;一道菜]→共同跑[的地方]
cours跑,发生,快速做……+er表名词→跑的人或动物
inter在……之间+cours跑,发生,快速做……+e→在二者之间跑→交流
re回+cours跑,发生,快速做……+e→跑回来→求助

sentences.en: I couldn’t tell which direction without recourse to a map.
sentences.cn: 不借助地图我就无法说清方位。

sentences.en: all citizens have recourse to justice.
sentences.cn: 所有的公民都对司法审判享有追索权。
